4.0.0-rc.0.name: react-toastify

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel --ignore=__tests__ src -d lib
scripts.build:umd: npm run clean:umd && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.style: npm run sass && cssnano dist/ReactToastify.css dist/ReactToastify.min.css --no-zindex --no-reduceIdents
